Affix.Name: Wanderer's Troupe
Affix.Desc: Increases Charged Attack DMG by 35% if the character uses a Catalyst or a Bow.

EQUIP_RING.Name: Wanderer's String-Kettle
EQUIP_RING.Desc: An ancient, strangely-shaped canteen. The interior is fitted with harp strings, which play a wondrous tune as the water flows out.

EQUIP_NECKLACE.Name: Bard's Arrow Feather
EQUIP_NECKLACE.Desc: An azure arrow fletching that has neither faded nor splintered with the passage of time. The sound of running water seems to linger around it.

EQUIP_DRESS.Name: Conductor's Top Hat
EQUIP_DRESS.Desc: A top hat that has managed to retain its radiance despite braving the elements for time untold. An ancient tune still resonates within.

EQUIP_BRACER.Name: Troupe's Dawnlight
EQUIP_BRACER.Desc: A small flower-shaped insignia. If you listen carefully, you can almost hear a flute playing and voices singing.

EQUIP_SHOES.Name: Concert's Final Hour
EQUIP_SHOES.Desc: An hourglass used to keep time during a band performance. It once made a crisp sound, but their performance has since ended.
